basics.name: Wilder H. Lizama Garcia
basics.summary: Hi there! I'm a software developer with 8 years of experience in various projects spanning both Backend and Frontend areas across web environments, APIs, desktop, mobile and services.

work.name: FTA DevBase LLC
highlights: Code migration from JavaScript to TypeScript and React.js for the portal of a nonprofit grantmaking application web app.
Development of new features and maintenance of a Native app with React Native for HVAC technicians.
Maintenance of a PWA for a company dedicated to the cash and bank accounts industry, utilizing APIs to process transactions.
Development of a library of user interface components using atomic design systems with Storybook for visual documentation.

work.name: GNT Servicios Generales S.A
highlights: Migrated desktop applications to web applications developed with React.js and KendoUI.
Developed and maintained ERP software and web intranet using Material UI, Bootstrap, and GraphQL for enhanced efficiency and flexibility in data management.
Managed T-SQL structure and tables in SQL Server.
Provided support for IIS 6.0 and Ubuntu Server 14.04.
Developed applications for consuming Gmail APIs for automatic registration of electronic documents.
Developed Java services for background execution using threads installed on the server.

work.name: Home Business Real Estate
highlights: Full development of a corporation website using React JS.
Proposal and maintenance of web design along with APIs.
Software testing and deployment.

work.name: 828 Transporte
highlights: Development and maintenance of desktop application accounting systems.
Management of T-SQL structure and tables.
Development of CLI scripts for server automation.

work.name: Coast Pacific Group
highlights: Development and maintenance of landing pages, as well as full JS website.
Software testing and deployment.
Development and maintenance of logistics ERP software, including the landing page.
Maintenance of the travel log system.
Software testing and deployment.

MySQL database management system
